thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com
thread.title: Karen Johnson

author: Karen Johnson
title: Karen Johnson
text: I have been looking for a website that would allow me to shop and send gifts to my son, his wife and my two granddaughters in Mainland China. This site is amazing. I was able to search (in English) and purchase items and have them sent to Shanghai. Items over $50 USD ship FREE. I am thrilled and will share this website with other family members Stateside here so that their shopping will be easy as well. Thank you, thank you, thank you. You have made this Grandmother very happy!
